int string2int ( const char *  digit,
int &  result 
) [inline]

Definition at line 380 of file Convection_Diffusion_Temperature.cpp.

{
  result = 0;

// --- Convert each digit char and add into result.
  while (*digit >= '0' && *digit <='9')
    {
      result = (result * 10) + (*digit - '0');
      digit++;
    }

// --- Check that there were no non-digits at end.
  if (*digit != 0)
    {
      return 0;
    }

  return 1;
}
